Articles.Content:
I created an air plane that resembles the concorde, it has a top speed of over 600 metres per second.

One problem I have in this episode of my LP is that my plane has too much wing surface area and pitching up past 30 degrees causes the nose to gradually flip upwards to a point where you have no control.

Please remember to like, comment and subscribe!

The .craft file is in the description of my video!
Maybe try with just 2 engines? And since the engines are under the wings and the lowest ones are probably also making you pitch up.
